QuestData.Title: Threat from Above
QuestData.Description: So you want to join the Skyguard? Well, I know you can fly... but can you fight?$B$BThe Skyguard is sworn to protect Shattrath from the dangers that loom above us, both near and far. The Gordunni ogres who dwell in the Barrier Hills to the north are an immediate threat to us.$B$BReaching the ogres has been problematic for Shattrath's ground units. That's where we come in. See what you can do to help contain them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay any 20 Gordunni Ogres in the Barrier Hills and return to Yuula in Shattrath City.
QuestData.RewardText: Good job, ace. I've a feeling you're going to fit in well with us.
